text: Jara te tonda phiravita asatila tara amhi tumhala tyancyavara dekharekha thevanara banavuna pathavile nahi. Tumace kartavya kevala (amaca) sandesa pohacavinyace ahe. Ani jevha amhi manasala apalya daya-krpeci godi cakhavito, tevha to tyavara sekhi miravu lagato ani jara tyancyavara, tyancya acaranamule ekhade sankata yete, tevha niscitaca manusya motha krtaghna ahe
